casebody.data:
No. 117,790 Court of Appeals of Kansas. Opinion filed November 9, 2018

Laurence M. JARVIS, an Individual Pro Se, and Bossaw Land Holding and Mgmt. Co., LLC, by and Through Its Managing Member, Laurence M. Jarvis, Pro Se, Appellant,
v.
Ronald P. WOOD, et al., Appellees.

Affirmed in part. Reversed in part. Remanded with directions.
